name: Flowers (soppart)
description:
This is a shmup

Controls.......

Move: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Space Bar

Start/Restart: Left Click

This shmup was made to be a departure from the standard space ship theme. Instead, I opted for a garden with some 'evil' flowers. If I were to expand upon this game, I would have there be a variety of flowers that have different properties.  With more flowers, I could achieve my initial goal, which was to have the bullet hell coming at you also take form of a beautiful garden. I would also have the scoring system work.  Thanks for playing!
